title: Vatican’s 2024 surplus represents ‘significant progress’ in economic situation
description:
VATICAN CITY (CNS) — The Vatican reported that it ended 2024 with a 1.6-million-euro surplus ($1.85 million) compared to a deficit of 51.2 million euros ($59.3 million) in 2023.

Its operational deficit, while not eliminated, was reduced almost by half from 83.5 million euros ($96.8 million) in 2023...
